title: HOUR 1 - Deshaun Watson, Trey Lance, Peter King
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Deshaun Watson, Trey Lance, Peter King
description:
Minutes before the show started, news broke that Deshaun Watson and the NFL has reached an agreement. In hour 1, Colin reacts to the breaking news and what that means for the Browns moving forward. Trey Lance is a raw talent, but his inconsistency is something of concern. Peter King joins the show talk Rookie QBs and more NFL. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
